generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Behavior.sniff Misc
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Allows this entity to detect the nearest player within "sniffing_radius" and update its "minecraft:suspect_tracking" component state

fields.title: Cooldown Range
fields.description: Cooldown range between sniffs in seconds Default value: [3.0, 10.0].

fields.title: Duration
fields.description: Sniffing duration in seconds Default value: 1.

fields.title: Suspicion Radius Horizontal
fields.description: Mob suspicion horizontal radius. When a player is within this radius horizontally, the anger level towards that player is increased Default value: 3.

fields.title: Suspicion Radius Vertical
fields.description: Mob suspicion vertical radius. When a player is within this radius vertically, the anger level towards that player is increased Default value: 3.
